text: East Lynne is a 1916 American drama movie directed by Bertman Bracken and based on the 1861 novel of the same name by Ellen Wood. It stars Theda Bara, Ben Deeley, Stuart Holmes, Claire Whitney, William H. Tooker and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1916 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies based on books
title: East Lynne (1916 movie)
